title: CLASH
body: Looking for clash players between silver and gold add hotguy69 to be able to play for team

replies.body:
IGN: Nightjar

Prefers tanks in the toplane, flexible pool in jungle and support, can fill other roles with a small pool.
hi im a supp main if you need it
